Code for All Summit 🌐

Sep 8, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • volunteer
  • code for all
  • summit
  • conference

Lorin Camargo and Sofía Corona, Co-Directors of Code for All join us for a conversation about their organization’s upcoming summit event. We’ll talk about what it’s all about, how they go about organizing it, and how they address some of its key challenges.
